summary: Implements a security check for Azure Front Door Web Application Firewall ACL configurations, analyzing ARM templates to detect settings that could expose the service to the Log4j vulnerability (CVE‑2021‑44228). The check inherits from the base resource validation framework and reports compliance status.
business_intent: Help organizations secure their Azure Front Door deployments by automatically flagging insecure WAF ACL configurations that may allow exploitation of the Log4j flaw, supporting compliance and risk mitigation efforts.
